action: I want to accurately manage contract details, expiration dates, and renewal conditions with business partners
reason: Because I need to prevent contract lapses, missed automatic renewals, and legal risks
acceptance_criteria: The system shall restrict contract operations exclusively to authenticated users with the 'Legal' role.
The system must automatically generate a globally unique Contract ID for each record.
The system shall validate that the provided Vendor ID exists in the vendor master database and reject invalid IDs.
The system must require mandatory Start and End Dates, ensuring the End Date is chronologically after the Start Date.
The system shall support file uploads (e.g., PDF) with strict validation for file size and type, storing them in encrypted storage.
The system must manage contract amounts as numeric values and associate them with a specific currency.
The system shall automatically transition the contract status to 'Expired' upon reaching the end date.
The system must generate a notification schedule if the Auto-Renewal flag is enabled.
The system shall publish a notification event to an asynchronous queue 30 days prior to the contract expiration date.
The system must implement optimistic locking to detect and prevent concurrent update conflicts.
The system shall maintain a comprehensive change history log, capturing pre-modification and post-modification values, User ID, and Timestamp.
The system must execute registration and updates within a single database transaction, ensuring rollback on failure.
The system shall allow logical deletion only by 'Administrator' roles and record the operation in the audit log.
The system must use parameterized queries and input sanitization to prevent SQL injection and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).
The system shall provide search functionality filtering by Vendor, Date Range, and Status, with sorting capability by expiration date.
The system must support CSV export of contract data with configurable masking for personal information.
The system shall enforce HTTPS (TLS 1.2+), rate limiting, and target an API response time of under 300ms.
The system must store audit logs in tamper-evident storage to prevent modification.
